title: Discovery Call - Test Discovery Caller
summary: Client discussed automation needs for their sales process. Currently using spreadsheets and manual data entry. Budget mentioned in 5k-10k range. Wants to move fast, decision maker.
ai_summary: Strong fit. Decision maker on the call. Budget 5-10k. Timeline: 2-3 weeks. Key pain: manual CRM data entry.
transcript:
Sales rep: Thanks for your time today. Can you tell me about your biggest challenge right now?
Client: We're drowning in manual data entry. Our team spends 10 hours a week just updating the CRM. We use Salesforce but it's not integrated with our other tools.
Sales rep: What would success look like for you?
Client: If we could automate the data entry and get reports without manual work, that would be huge. We have budget - probably 5 to 10k for the right solution. I can make the call, we want to move fast.
Sales rep: Great. We can definitely help. Let me put together a proposal.
